        Adds a managed instagram source by user
        Parameters:

      • byTag

        public Instagram byTag(String tag,
              boolean exactMatch)
        Adds a resource by tag
        Parameters:
        tag - the tag, e.g cat
        exactMatch - true when a tag must be an exact match or false when the tag should match the instragram tag search behaviour
        Returns:
        this

      • byArea

        public Instagram byArea(float longitude,
               float lattitude)

      • byArea

        public Instagram byArea(float longitude,
               float latitude,
               int distance)
        Adds a resource a given area
        Parameters:
        longitude - the longitude value of the coordinates to use
        latitude - the latitude value of the coordinate to use
        distance - an optional distance which marks the radius around the given area, defaults to 1000 and must be between 1 and 5000 metres
        Returns:
        this

      • byLocation

        public Instagram byLocation(float longitude,
                   float latitude)

      • byLocation

        public Instagram byLocation(float longitude,
                   float latitude,
                   int distance)
        Adds a resource a given location
        Parameters:
        longitude - the longitude value of the coordinates to use
        latitude - the latitude value of the coordinate to use
        distance - an optional distance which marks the radius around the given area, defaults to 1000 and must be between 1 and 5000 metres
        Returns:
        this
        See Also:
        byArea(float, float, int)

      • byFoursquareLocation

        public Instagram byFoursquareLocation(String fourSquareLocation)
        The same as byLocation(float, float, int) but instead of using coordinates a foursquare location ID is provided
        Parameters:
        fourSquareLocation - a valid foursquare location ID e.g. 5XfVJe
        Returns:
        this

      • byPopularity

        public Instagram byPopularity()
        Adds a resource that is filtered based on popularity

      • addResource

        protected Instagram addResource(Instagram.Type type,
                    String value,
                    float longitude,
                    float lattitude,
                    int distance,
                    boolean exactMatch,
                    String fourSquareLocation)
        Adds a resource object to the request of the given type, which is always required
        Parameters:
        type - the type of resource, all other params are optional dependent upon what this value is
        Returns:
        this

      • addOAutToken

        public Instagram addOAutToken(String oAuthAccessToken,
                     long expires,
                     String name)
        Adds an OAuth token to the managed source
        Parameters:
        oAuthAccessToken - an oauth2 token
        name - a human friendly name for this auth token
        expires - identity resource expiry date/time as a UTC timestamp, i.e. when the token expires
        Returns:
        this
